name: >>Fatal Point
description:
It's a fast-paced top-down shooter, in which you play as a robot designed to fight other robots in a great competition. You are equipped with a pistol, assault rifle, and shotgun. There's no goal, you just need to beat your last high score. However, there's one little catch. You need to follow the one rule, that changes every 40 seconds.

After every "rule change", you restore all lost HP. Dashing/Dodge'ing grant you 1 second of invincibility.

Jam version is not well balanced, it is really frustrating and does not forgive the player's mistakes.

Every sound in the game is public domain (CC0).

Gra zrobiona na ZS6 Game Jam. //Drużyna DENIED
